common.Question: Question
common.errorMessage: Round active, but no question currently displayed. This should not happen.

hostScreen.configureWouldILie: ‚ö†Ô∏è Configure "Would I Lie" rounds before starting
hostScreen.configureWouldILieFirst: Configure Would I Lie rounds first
hostScreen.continueHint: Continue to current game or start new series

wouldILie.title: Would I Lie to You?
wouldILie.subtitle: The classic bluffing game!
wouldILie.rule1: A photo will be shown to all players
wouldILie.rule2: The host secretly assigns one player as the "truth teller" who actually knows the person, and one as the "liar"
wouldILie.rule3: Both players must convince others that THEY are the one who knows the person
wouldILie.rule4: Other players vote on who they think is telling the truth
wouldILie.rule5: Correct votes earn points! Wrong votes give points to the liar
wouldILie.pointsInfo: 10 points for correct guesses ‚Ä¢ Liar earns points for each fooled player

contestantGuess.title: Contestant Guess
contestantGuess.subtitle: Can you spot who's hiding in the morph?
contestantGuess.rule1: A morphed photo combining a contestant with a celebrity will appear
contestantGuess.rule2: Study the image carefully - who is hiding in there?
contestantGuess.rule4: All players must answer before the reveal

quiz.title: Quiz of 2025
quiz.subtitle: How well do you remember this year?
quiz.rule1: Test your knowledge of what happened in 2025!
quiz.rule2: Each question has 4 possible answers - pick wisely
quiz.rule3: Speed matters! First 2 correct answers get bonus points
quiz.rule4: 1st place: +10 bonus points ‚Ä¢ 2nd place: +5 bonus points
quiz.rule5: Everyone who answers correctly gets base points

socialMediaGuess.title: Social Media Deep Dive
socialMediaGuess.subtitle: Who posted THAT?!
socialMediaGuess.rule1: A social media post will be shown - but who posted it?
socialMediaGuess.rule2: Look for clues in the writing style, content, and context
socialMediaGuess.rule4: These are REAL posts from the contestants!

wager.title: All-In Wager
wager.subtitle: Double or nothing on the host!
wager.rule1: Wager any amount of your points before each question
wager.rule2: Answer fun facts about the host
wager.rule3: Correct answer: Win double your wager!
wager.rule5: Risk it all or play it safe - your choice!
wager.pointsInfo: Double your wager or lose it all

blindWager.title: üé≤ Place Your Wager
blindWager.subtitle: How confident are you? Bet before you see the question!
blindWager.howManyPoints: How many points do you want to wager?
blindWager.wagerHint: Wager up to {{max}} points. Correct answer wins double!
blindWager.waitingForWagers: ‚è≥ Waiting for all players to place their wagers...
blindWager.revealHint: The question will be revealed once everyone has wagered!

host.playersPlacingBets: Players are placing their wagers without seeing the question!
host.waitingForAll: Waiting for all players to place their wagers...
